traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The krasis can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The krasis makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage.
